item.title: By: karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: Thanks for the article. A modern day fairy tale of sorts. Recently was on a massive search myself, for a song, sung by a particular artist. Knew not the title nor the crooner. Like the author of this article,I also, after much traversing, found it! It was very exhilirating to say the least.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the article. A modern day fairy tale of sorts.
Recently was on a massive search myself, for a song, sung by a particular artist. Knew not the title nor the crooner. Like the author of this article,I also, after much traversing, found it! It was very exhilirating to say the least.

item.title: By: jen
item.dc:creator: jen
item.description: I enjoyed the article. Glad you posted it.
item.content:encoded: I enjoyed the article. Glad you posted it.
